item.title: Version 1.9.0
item.description:
Changes

  • Updated Oculus SDK to version 1.41
  • Improved frame blocking behavior to enhance performance in UE4 games
  • Removed patching function from the tray icon to avoid user confusion
    • Still available by manually copying files if you know what you're doing

Bug fixes

  • Revive: Added default bindings for Vive Cosmos controllers (#1340)
  • Revive: Fixed Dance Central regression that causes fatal errors (#1334)
  • Revive: Fixed menu button on the Left controller not working (#1339)
  • Revive: Fixed thumbstick recenter triggering on both controllers when only touching one (#1357)
  • ReviveXR: Fixed missing loader DLL oversight and added various fixes contributed by @qlyoung (#1323)
